type: Batteries and generators and kinetic power transmission
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires forklift batteries, 18 in total, that must also be installed on DND’s equipment. Delivery will be made to CFB Halifax Dockyard Bldg. D-206 and Bldg. D-200 Delivery and installation of all batteries is requested by 31 May, 2023.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Forklift Batteries

**Reference**: WS3534526608-Doc3971693267
**Solicitation**: WS3534526608
**Posted**: 2023-04-20
**Closing Date**: 2023-05-29T14:00:00 EST

#### Project Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires 18 forklift batteries to be installed on their equipment. The batteries are to be sourced through a competitive bidding process. The contractor will be responsible for the delivery and installation of the batteries at CFB Halifax Dockyard, Bldg. D-206 and Bldg. D-200.

#### Technical Requirements
The forklift batteries must be installed on DND’s equipment. Delivery and installation of all batteries is requested by May 31, 2023.

#### Contract Terms
The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

#### Contact Information
Those interested in responding to the tender should contact:

Kirk Tyler, Contractual Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [kirk.tyler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kirk.tyler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Documents
The tender package is accessible on Ariba’s Discovery platform: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16055546?extsite=MTYwNTU1NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16055546?extsite=MTYwNTU1NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Note
This tender cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number W0100-233395/A, dated 2022-08-16, with a closing of 2022-10-18. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.  end.
